title: Dyslexic MP defends himself against online trolls who mock his spelling mistakes
text:
A dyslexic MP has defended himself against trolls who mock his spelling mistakes online revealing he has reading age of eight-year-old.

Labour's Peter Kyle shared an insight into living with acute dyslexia in Twitter thread which he posted after receiving some "sneering and brutal" comments about his spelling on the social media site.

"I want to say something about living with acute dyslexia because Twitter can be a pretty unforgiving place for people with unseen challenges," he tweeted.

"What's it like? Imagine a car where the gearbox (my eyes) isn't connected properly to the engine (brain).

"Sometimes words are just shapes... I can see the shape but it simply has no meaning."

Mr Kyle said...
description: A dyslexic MP has defended himself against trolls who mock his spelling mistakes online revealing he has reading age of eight-year-old.
